title: All About Olaf
description: The unofficial mobile app for St. Olaf College.
longDescription: This iOS app provides valuable information to students, faculty, staff, and visitors of St. Olaf College.
detailList: Browse cafe menus
Access balances and meal plan info
Release print jobs
Explore student work opportunities
Search for courses
View building open and close schedules
Peruse all campus-wide calendars
Access the campus directory and important contacts
Tune-in to streaming events and radio programs
Keep up with campus news
See the campus at a birds-eye view with the map
Track the local bus routes
Define campus terms with the dictionary
Discover clubs and organizations
Quick access to Moodle

title: Class Dumper
description: Examine Objective-C runtime information stored in Mach-O files.
detailList: Invoke class-dump 3.5 (64 bit) from the file picker
Save results to a local sqlite database with GRDB
Manage previous dumps from a finder-like interface

title: CCC Server
description: A node server to power All About Olaf and CARLS.
detailList: Network request caching
Data fetching for Google Calendar, RSS, Wordpress, ReasonCMS, Github Pages, Bon Appetit, and Presence.io

title: CCC Server Next
description: The next version of CCC-Server, written in Rust.
detailList: Crates for fetching, parsing, and serving data
Distinct types for serde endpoints
Exported typedefs for typescript clients
Data fetching for Wordpress, GitHub pages, and Bon Appetit
